plot: As 10-yr-old, Hemera prepares to see the big solar eclipse from home, it becomes apparent that this is no ordinary girl and this will not be an ordinary eclipse either.
title: Hemera's Eclipse
plot_es: As 10-yr-old, Hemera prepares to see the big solar eclipse from home, it becomes apparent that this is no ordinary girl and this will not be an ordinary eclipse either.
plot_en: As 10-yr-old, Hemera prepares to see the big solar eclipse from home, it becomes apparent that this is no ordinary girl and this will not be an ordinary eclipse either.
